Highly Experienced Talent
Gigexecs works with professionals from around the world. All of our freelancers have a minimum of 10 years experience.
Trusted Talent
Our high- quality vetting of freelancers and clients ensures a trusted and safe workspace for both users
Flexibility
Gigexecs is a remote job marketplace that allows users to charge per hour or gig, allowing flexibility in setting your own rates.
Our features
Your success story
GigExecs.com is a platform that connects clients to the world’s most experienced professionals.
Search and filter
Allows users to quickly and easily find the gigs/ talent they are looking for by narrowing down search results according to specific criteria.
Best Matched
Our advanced matching engine helps users save time by recommending the best fit for your needs. Matches can further be filtered based on criteria such as skills, relevant experience or their rating on the Gigexecs platform.
Customisation
Both freelancers and clients are able to customise the way they want to work together - whether it’s a casual, hourly rate engagement or a longer project with milestones, we provide both flexibility and control to align to your needs.
Earning/ Spending details
Allows users to track their financial transactions on the platform - these details typically include information such as earnings, fees, and payment histories
Messaging forum
Allows freelancers and clients to exchange messages and discuss gig details in a centralized and secure platform.
Open a dispute
Allows either the freelancer or client to initiate a dispute resolution process if they are not satisfied with the outcome, the timeline or the budget of a gig.
An on-demand marketplace for highly experienced professionals
